title: Gravity Balanced Arm Exoskeleton for Basketball Shooting Training
abstract:
This paper proposes a gravity balanced arm exoskeleton design for basketball
shooting training. The potential energy equation of the mechanism is derived. A
simulation of the arm going through the basketball shooting motion is done on
the mechanism. Throughout the motion the total potential energy is constant.
Thus, the proposed arm exoskeleton is indeed gravity balanced with the use of
two springs.
subjects: Electrical Engineering and Systems Science/Systems and Control
